original: Borgquist, Per-Axel Lionel, civilingenjör, Göteborg, f. 27/2/11 i Gbg av sjökapt. F. L. B. o. Edith Kjerstens-dotter. G. 40 m. Brita Bauge. Barn: Ulla-Brita f. 42, Bo 43. — Elev v. Gbgs h. real, CTI ^1. avd. 28-31, h. avd. (eltekn.) 31-34. Platsing. v. lin-jebyggn. v. Sydsv. Kraft A-B Kal-markont. 35, ÄEGs filial i Gbg ised. 37, AEG i Berlin 39-40, försäljn :chef sed. 47. Assist, v. CTH 39-45, lär. v. Gbgs Tekn. Inst. 40-46, led. av Tekn. Samf.
translated: Borgquist, Per-Axel Lionel, engineer, Gothenburg, born February 27, 1911 in Gothenburg to ship captain F.L.B. and Edith Kjerstens-daughter. Married in 1940 to Brita Bauge, with two children: Ulla-Brita (born 1942) and Bo (born 1943). He was a student at Gothenburg's Higher Real Gymnasium, CTI ^1. Department from 1928-1931 and in the electrical engineering department from 1931-1934. He began working at the South Swedish Power Line Construction Company's Kalmar branch in 1935, at AEG's Gothenburg branch in 1937, and at AEG in Berlin from 1939-1940 as a sales manager, before returning to Sweden and becoming an assistant at Chalmers University of Technology from 1939-1945 and a lecturer at Gothenburg's Technical Institute from 1940-1946. He was also a member of the Swedish Society of Engineering.

worksFor.name: South Swedish Power Line Construction Company
